name: ResPol
short_description:
Respol: A software package for computing projections of resultant polytopes

Description:
Respol is C++ software to compute a projection of the Newton polytope
of the resultant of a given polynomial system.
These are indirectly defined high-dimensional polytopes.

Related Papers:
[1] I.Z.Emiris, V.Fisikopoulos, C.Konaxis, L.Peñaranda. 
An oracle-based, output sensitive algorithm for  projections of resultant polytopes.   
International J. Computational Geometry & Applications (Special issue) World Scientific, 2013.

[2] I.Z.Emiris, V.Fisikopoulos, C.Konaxis, L.Peñaranda. 
An output-sensitive algorithm for computing projections of resultant polytopes. 
In Proc. 28th Annual Symposium on Computational Geometry (SoCG 2012), pp.179-188, Chapel Hill, USA.
